name: df-sub
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmin, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, crio(s2, cc, wceq(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))
comment: Define subtraction. Theorem ~ subval shows its value (and describes how this definition works), theorem ~ subaddi relates it to addition, and theorems ~ subcli and ~ resubcli prove its closure laws. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1994.)
